sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating" const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
${price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
) } export default TourDetails
